law.catch_line: Victim of hate crime deemed victim of criminally injurious conduct.
law.text: A person who suffers personal injury as a result of conduct in violation of KRS 532.031 is a victim of criminally injurious conduct as defined in KRS 346.020 and is eligible for awards pursuant to KRS Chapter 346.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 53, effective July 15, 1998.
